duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, maintain, repair, or replace fire sprinkler equipment and systems in strict accordance with applicable codes and standards.
Service and inspection of wet, dry and pre-action fire suppression systems.
Testing of fire pumps and flow testing of fire hydrants.
Perform maintenance and repairs on fire sprinkler systems and small tenant improvements on both commercial and residential properties.
Maintain good customer relationships and ensure clean and quality workmanship.
Manual labor including lifting, climbing, and clean up, and the ability to work under pressure and meet project deadlines.
Exhibit a professional image to the customer and general public in accordance with established standards.
Work side by side with a senior Fire Sprinkler Service Technician at times, demonstrating good communication skills and teamwork.
Occasionally lift and/or move up to 100 pounds and work alternative shifts or weekends to meet customer and/or job requirements.
Demonstrate self-motivated work ethic and strong organizational skills.

education_certification.credential: Valid Driver’s License and clean driving record.
